schemas.description: Add recommendation request object
Admin user object

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

schemas.description: Consultant profile object

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

age.description: The age of consultant, this derived from social security number

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the consultant

dateOfEmployment.description: Date of employment of the consultant

hourlyPay.description: Hourly pay pay of the consultant

holidayPayPercentage.description: Additional hourly pay percentage of the consultant

hasTeacherLicense.description: If consultant has a teacher license

hasDriverLicense.description: If consultant has a driver license

workedOrders.description: Total number of worked orders of the consultant

hasBeenRecommended.description: whether or not the consultant has been recommended by the logged in user

gender.description: gender of the consulant, according to socialSecurityNumber

recruitId.description: If this field is present, consultant went through the recruitment process and his/her data can be found in recruitment-service with this id.

schemas.description: Request object to create a internal user
Request object to create a Consultant

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the consultant

dateOfEmployment.description: Date of employment of the consultant

hourlyPay.description: Hourly pay pay of the consultant

holidayPayPercentage.description: Additional hourly pay percentage of the consultant

hasTeacherLicense.description: If consultant has a teacher license

hasDriverLicense.description: If consultant has a driver license

recruitId.description: If this field is present, consultant went through the recruitment process and his/her data can be found in recruitment-service with this id.

schemas.description: Request object to create a customer account

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

customerId.description: Id of the customer (organization), not set if user is area manager

contractId.description: Id of contract of the area manager

customerIds.description: Ids of the customers (organizations) that allow to access to the area manager

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the customer account

schemas.description: Customer account profile object

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

customerId.description: Id of the customer (organization), not set if user is area manager

customerIds.description: Ids of the customers (organizations) that allow to access to the area manager

contractId.description: Id of contract of the area manager

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the customer account

schemas.description: Request getting auth user

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

schemas.description: Response object for get users list

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

gender.description: gender of the consulant, according to socialSecurityNumber

email.description: Email address (only available if customer account)

phoneNumber.description: Phone number (only available if customer account)

oneflowId.description: Oneflow id for admin user (only available if admin account)

totalCount.description: Total number of users for given query

customerId.description: Id of the customer (organization), not set if user is area manager

schemas.description: User object

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

items.description: the scopes of the roles of the user.

schemas.description: Request for block / unblock a consultant (Both use the same request structure)

customerId.description: the id of the customer who is blocking the consultant

schemas.description: Response with customers a consultant is blocked by
Request for adding an on leave entry for a consultant

id.description: read only id of the absence entry

consultantId.description: the id of the consultant the absence belongs to

startDate.description: the start date of the absence

endDate.description: the end date of the absence

schemas.description: Response from getting available consultants

id.description: Read-only unique id

schemas.description: Request getting users by

type.description: User type which need to be filtered by

criminalRecordExpirationStatus.description:
There are three statuses
					`not_expired` - Records with criminalRecordsReportExpireDate  is not expired,
					`expired` - Records with criminalRecordsReportExpireDate  is expired,
					 `expires_soon` - Records with criminalRecordsReportExpireDate  will expire within one month

available.description:
Use for get available consultant by date.
					Values should be  `monday`, `tuesday`, `wednesday`, `thursday`, `friday`, `saturday`, `sunday`

customer.description: Id of customer to filter by

blockedConsultantsFor.description: Id of customer to get blocked consultants for, returns a list of only blocked consultants (only works if logged in user has account.consultant.block.get permission)

schemas.description: Response object for get users list via service call

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

email.description: Email address (only available if customer account)

phoneNumber.description: Phone number (only available if customer account)

totalCount.description: Total number of users for given query

schemas.description: Response object for get user for auth service

id.description: Read-only unique id, is set during creation

items.description: the scopes of the roles of the user.

contractId.description: Id of contract of the area manager

id.description: Customer id
Customer id

totalCount.description: Total number of users for given query

schemas.description: Response from getting available consultants

id.description: Read-only unique id

schemas.description: Request getting users by

type.description: User type which need to be filtered by

criminalRecordExpirationStatus.description:
There are three statuses
					`not_expired` - Records with criminalRecordsReportExpireDate  is not expired,
					`expired` - Records with criminalRecordsReportExpireDate  is expired,
					 `expires_soon` - Records with criminalRecordsReportExpireDate  will expire within one month

available.description:
Use for get available consultant by date.
					Values should be  `monday`, `tuesday`, `wednesday`, `thursday`, `friday`, `saturday`, `sunday`

customer.description: Id of customer to filter by

blockedConsultantsFor.description: Id of customer to get blocked consultants for, returns a list of only blocked consultants (only works if logged in user has account.consultant.block.get permission)
